title: How to make money from my blog? What kind of blogs make money if there are certain types - Quora

response.answer_text: Any blog can make money. However, its true that some are more profitable than others. Personally, I have 2 blogs. 1 in the art niche, the other in the food niche. Both make me money each day, but the food blog makes a little bit more. Combined they are generating over $2,000 a month, which is pretty goof considering they don't require that much work. I make money from ads on both. I’m with the ad network Mediavine who are similar to Adsense, but they generally pay you a lot more and their customer service is great. Here are some ways that you can make money from your blog: Ads / ad networkAffiliate marketingWorking with brandsSell to your email listSell an eBookPrint on demand
It depends on what kinda blog you are running. Your monetization should be as your blog category.
